getLocalTopicURL

public static URL getLocalTopicURL(Element topicref)
Returns the URL of the topic referenced by specified topicref, if this topic is a local one (that is, format=dita, scope=local).

Specified topicref is expected to come from a simple map, where all attributes and metadata have been cascaded.

doGetLocalTopicURL

public static URL doGetLocalTopicURL(Element topicref)
                              throws IllegalArgumentException
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException

getFormat

public static String getFormat(Element topicref,
                               String href)

guessFormat

public static String guessFormat(String href)
Returns the lower-case DITA format (dita, ditamap, html, etc) corresponding to the file extension of specified relative or absolute URL. Returns null if such format cannot be determined.

getTopicId

public static String getTopicId(URL url)
Returns the topic ID referenced in the fragment of specified URL. Returns null if there is no such ID.

Example returns foo for file:///tmp/bar.dita#foo/gee.

inheritFormat

public static String inheritFormat(Element topicref,
                                   String href)
